name: K-pop Idol Survival
description:
K-pop Idol Survival game is a simulation game built with Spinoff.

Try your journey of making a K-pop Idol! It may be tough, unfair and things might not end up as you expected.. But when you succeed, you will feel the joy of training your idol. Do your best to succeed ALL stages!

*Please note this game is made for amusement purposes only and is NOT based on real events.

Enjoy the game!
